extendedInfo.description: This App using a mini floating windows to display real-time what current internet bandwidth used for upload and download, when you use any Apps.For example:When you look video on YouTube App, this App could display real time speed about current internet bandwidth used, very useful. (Please refer our example photo)Our features:âDisplay real-time network bandwidth used for upload and downloadâCustomized color of display by userâCustomized location of display by userâUsing mini floating window for display network statisticsâNotify features.Pro version support hides monitor for specific apps, and it is Ads-free:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.easy.apps.networkflowwindows.pro

reviews.title: A must have simply focused on most user needs
reviews.comment: However a font size setup should be included. We still wait it
reviews.author: Franz remoter

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: ... user needs to be able to adjust (increase) font size of floating display and it also needs a contrasting background to ensure that it always remains visible.
reviews.author: John P Coates

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: Would like a option to change text size and refresh period as well as start with OS option, thanks.
reviews.author: Barry G
